scripts.build:apis: mkdir -p generated/apis && for api in drivers-api teams-api tracks-api races-api seasons-api events-api results-api; do if [ -d "$api" ]; then echo "Building $api..."; npx tsp compile "$api/main.tsp" --emit @typespec/openapi3 --output-dir generated || echo "Failed to build $api, skipping..."; if [ -f "generated/@typespec/openapi3/openapi.yaml" ]; then cp generated/@typespec/openapi3/openapi.yaml generated/apis/$api.yaml; fi; fi; done
scripts.build:docs: npm run build && npm run generate:docs
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run generate:docs && npm run generate:sdks
scripts.preview: npm run build:docs && npm run serve:docs
scripts.test: npm run build && echo 'Build test passed'
